meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Constant</kanji> <kanji>example</kanji>s that you use all the time end up becoming part of an <vocabulary>established practice</vocabulary>. You constantly use them so it just stays that way after a while.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
